name: Growth data
tagline: Growth of structure data for cosmological analysis
body:
Here is some code to use redshift-space distortion growth of structure data with the cosmological analysis package cosmomc (http://cosmologist.info/cosmomc/). You will need to download a version of cosmomc first, and then use the updated files in this repository to recompile the source code.

Data is taken from [Blake et al 2012](http://arxiv.org/abs/1204.4725) (WiggleZ), [Beutler et al 2012](http://arxiv.org/abs/1204.3674) (6dFGRS) and [Reid et al (2012)](http://arxiv.org/abs/1203.6641) (BOSS).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
